title: Google Pixel (1st Generation) Suddenly Stop Charging using USB-C to USB-C original chargers.
content:
A week ago, suddenly, my Google Pixel stopped charging when I use usb-c to usb-c charger. Also when I connect usb-c to usb-c laptop. When I hard restart my phone (press power por 10 secs) the it starts charging but when I unplugged it for more than a minute, it stop working again.

However, if I use a USB-A to USB-C charger, it works with no issues.

I have Google Pixel (1st generation) running Android 10 (Oct 6th 2019 security patch level)
